first heard wanted right away since live cal knew wouldnt anytime soon  i flew cal short trip koja first stop early wasnt busy yet  i decided beef koja kamikaze fries  the beef koja kbbq beef sautéed onions lettuce sliced pineapple spicy sauce crispy chewy rice patties act bun sesame seeds sprinkled  the combination fantastic  next time ill add kimchi  i add siracha  the kamikaze fries waffle cut fries bulgogi beef minced kimchi green onions spicy sauce  both items delish worth going  there street parking front parking structure diagonal offers first hour free  i liked koja flavors  hope open joint near soon
